title: Supervision outline
perfectFor: Organising supervisions, using an About section, a Schedule page, an overview of the supervision sessions and Participants.

When

E.g. Every Tuesday and Thursday from 1.30 pm until 5.30 pm,
or Group 1, 2 and 3 on Tuesdays, Group 4 and 5 on Thursdays.
To determine your timeslot, please have a look at 'Schedule'.


Where

E.g. Austin Building, Room 1
XXX College


Contact

Supervisors' First and Last Name
E.g. Austin Building, Room 1
XXX College
(to deliver your homework or to ask urgent questions)

Mobile: 0123 456 789
(if you ever need me in a hurry)

${refid}6.page:
Please sign up for supervisions below by choosing 'Edit page', then replacing '<names>' with your name(s), then choosing 'Save'.

Homework for <Title session 1>



Answer questions 7 and 8 from the past papers, and complete the C section of the practical exam.
Please hand in work by Xday, 10 pm at my college (don't forget to mention my name to the porter), or email it to me by that same time.
